summary: Teenage lovers in the 1940s are separated by World War II and then later reunited in the 1980s, but encounter new complications when they try to rekindle their relationship..
cast: Lauren Bacall|Anthony Quinn|Jean-Pierre Aumont|Lila Kedrova|Francesco Quinn|Louise Vincent|Robert Le Béal|Jacques Marin|Sarah Alafandari|Carina Barone|Véronique Baylaucq|Annika Bullus|Martine de Breteuil|Colin Fox|Maurice Garrel|Pierre Gérald|Maurice Jacquemont|Susannah Kenton|Philippe Lasry|Thierry Magnier|Dominique Marcas|Patrick Salvador|Paul Soles|Almanta Suska|Paul Vally
title: A Star for Two
